name: ghost
description: Ghost is a powerful, open-source blogging platform and CMS focused on publishing, newsletters, and memberships. It offers a clean writing interface, custom themes, APIs, and managed hosting as an option alongside self-hosting.
features: Professional Publishing: Create and publish content with a powerful, modern blogging platform and CMS.
Newsletter Integration: Send newsletters directly to subscribers with built-in email delivery and management.
Membership Tools: Monetize content with paid subscriptions, member-only posts, and tiered access.
Custom Themes: Design unique sites with a flexible theming system and extensive customization options.
Content API: Access content programmatically via RESTful and GraphQL APIs for headless implementations.
SEO Optimized: Built-in SEO features including meta tags, sitemaps, and structured data.
Editor Experience: Write with a clean, distraction-free editor supporting markdown and rich media.
Self-Hosted or Managed: Choose between self-hosting or Ghost's managed cloud hosting service.
